subject: Sumo Wrestling News Update
intro: Here are the latest updates from the world of sumo wrestling!

articles.title: Onosato Promoted to Yokozuna After Historic Tournament Victory
articles.content:
Onosato from Nishonoseki stable has been promoted to yokozuna 
                     following his dominant performance in the September 2025 basho in Tokyo. 
                     The 25-year-old wrestler achieved a perfect 15-0 record, defeating 
                     ozeki Terunofuji in the final match. This promotion makes him the 
                     75th yokozuna in sumo history. The Japan Sumo Association announced 
                     the promotion during a ceremony at the Kokugikan.

articles.title: Onosato Promoted As The 75th Yokozuna In History
articles.content: Japanese sitemap home>Kyokai Information>ã€€Information The Nihon Sumo Kyokai is proud to announce that on May 28, 2025, following a special board of directors meeting, Ozeki Onosato (Nishonoseki Stable) was promoted to the rank of Yokozuna.He now becomes the 75th yokozuna in history. articles.title: Hoshoryu Promoted As The 74th Yokozuna In History
articles.content: Japanese sitemap home>Kyokai Information>ã€€Information The Nihon Sumo Kyokai is proud to announce that on January 29, 2025, following a special board of directors meeting, Ozeki Hoshoryu (Tatsunami Stable) was promoted to the rank of Yokozuna. He now becomes the 74th yokozuna in history.
